name: Baby Click (Proto Android)
description:
Hey,

Baby click is a clicker game project for android
it is in super basic condition.

there is no real goal on this game if it is not clicked.

I created it in 3:00. to test the performance of my smartphone.

I'm not sure yet when I'll update it with a fun playable version.
but you can follow my crazy ideas here or on social media. My personal projects advance on Saturday and Sunday depending on the time available.

I created a family game studio in the first production which will hopefully be released in 2021.

"the Palm Concept Logo comes from my new studio"
